name: sentinelai-backend
description: Backend service for **SentinelAI**, an AI-assisted situational awareness plugin for CivTAK.   It ingests real-world data feeds (e.g. aviation, ground tracks, weather), keeps a live in-memory view of the world, and exposes an API that turns **natural language requests** into **map overlays** for the CivTAK plugin.
author: Barnaby Falls <bfalls@outlook.com>
